name: ai-dev-suite-root
description: AI Dev Suite - Frontend e Backend integrados

scripts.move:dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.emptyDirSync('./ai-dev-suite-backend/src/public'); fs.moveSync('./ai-dev-suite-frontend/dist', './ai-dev-suite-backend/src/public', { overwrite: true }); console.log('Frontend build moved to backend/src/public');"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run move:dist
